last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3
last_episode_to_air.overview: The police request a media blackout and are now on high alert. After a shocking turn, they must defuse the situation before the manhunt for Raoul Moat ends in further tragedy.

name: The Hunt for Raoul Moat
overview: Follows the police operation in 2010 to apprehend fugitive Raoul Moat. He went to Northumbria after killing one person and wounding two others.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The first of a three-part crime drama, based on real events. Samantha Stobbart's fears about the release of her violent ex-boyfriend Raoul Moat from prison become justified.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: With Moat still at large after a devastating attack, the police work against the clock to bring him in before he is able to inflict more damage.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: The police request a media blackout and are now on high alert. After a shocking turn, they must defuse the situation before the manhunt for Raoul Moat ends in further tragedy.
